name: Streamline social
tagline: Crafting Web & Mobile products with AI components
description:
Streamline social is a software design & engineering company.
Our job is to unlock new opportunities for clients of all shapes and sizes, from the Fortune 500 to start-ups. we craft web & mobile solutions, combining AI and Data elements that improve customers KPIs. 
How? By leveraging the latest technologies and the bravest people.
Our product development approach starts with the consumers! We mix technology analysis, market analysis, social profiling and validation which results in rapid product prototyping. This satisfies our guiding principals; Mitigate risk in misinterpreting the “need” (market fit, requirements) and increase product market adoption by targeting influencers at early stages.
Capabilities We help brands architect their entire digital ecosystem across device, platform, and touchpoint.
Custom Mobile App Development 
Smartphone & Tablets (Android, iOS)
Hybrid App Development (Web + Mobile)
